Articles.Content:
Heya,

Here's a fun little challenge I've thought of for our flyboys here, take a rocket, any rocket, and land it on the hanger, Vehicle assembly building, whatever you want to call it.

Any and all parts are free to use, rocket can be as complex or simplistic as possible, anything goes aside from-

Jeb can not be scared, he's the prankster here but despite what some might think he's not stupid enough to do anything too reckless, so he can be either smiling in evil glee or putting in a mock-serious face to throw off suspicion.

No parachutes, while it's fine to have parachutes on the craft, NONE of them can be deployed

Must be at a dead stop, fully landed, no thrusters active, you know the drill.

Post a screenshot, have some fun with this one, the only reward is hopefully some laughs, so don't fret if someone's using a hacked craft or the like. ^.^

Bonus points if your craft can safely take off again after landing.

Here's my example picture, a craft built just for this one task, I unfortunately lost two thrusters in the landing but oh well.
Throttle is far too un-responsive for this sort of thing to be 'fun' for me right now.

you might want to limit the required parts.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=970.0

nicely played sofa, great throttle control.

And I meant it when I said any parts allowed, think of this less of a challenge and more just something for fun. You can make it as easy or as difficult for yourself as you want.

Honestly, I'm tempted to try this with the brick if it wasn't for the fact stages are bugging out to the nightmarish degree for me right now.

http://imgur.com/gallery/pFDQt

I just wanted to land on the ground.

1 hour ago, notsodeadjeb said:

 

http://imgur.com/gallery/pFDQt

I just wanted to land on the ground.

Nice Necro, this has to be the oldest thread I've ever seen. It's been 5 years!

As another user has pointed out, this thread is faaaaaaaaaar past its sell-by date. Be sure to check the post dates of threads you respond to in the future, @notsodeadjeb, as the thread is probably quite outdated.

Also, @HoloYolo please report any necro posts you find rather than only responding to them
